content.text: Trick or Trade 2022 brings spooky strategy and festive fun to the Pokémon TCG. Featuring Ghost- and Dark-type Pokémon, eerie Trainer cards, and mechanics that reward clever tactics, this set turns every match into a game of cunning and surprise. With haunting artwork, seasonal flair, and unexpected twists around every corner, Trick or Trade 2022 invites Trainers to embrace the mischief—and make every battle a treat.
